questions.text:
#### Q1. What is one reason to click Object > Text Frame Options?

- %OPTION% to change the number of columns in a text frame
- %OPTION% to apply a drop shadow to the frame
- %OPTION% to change the corners of a frame from corner to rounded
- %OPTION% to change the fill and stroke of a text frame

[Ref.](https://www.agitraining.com/adobe/indesign/tutorials/text-frame-options-in-indesign?page=4#:~:text=You%20can%20have%20InDesign%20determine,choosing%20Object%20%3E%20Text%20Frame%20Options.)

#### Q2. Which panel allows you to add an arrowhead to the end of a line?

- %OPTION% Effects
- %OPTION% Stroke
- %OPTION% Transform
- %OPTION% Pathfinder

[Ref.](https://helpx.adobe.com/in/indesign/using/applying-line-stroke-settings.html#:~:text=Use%20the%20Start%20and%20End,the%20Start%20and%20End%20menus.)

#### Q3. In the image shown, what do you know about the Body Text paragraph style?

![Q3](images/Q3.jpg)

- %OPTION% The selected text was not formatted using the style definition.
- %OPTION% The selected text is in overset text outside the boundaries of the current frame.
- %OPTION% The style has been applied to two or more paragraphs.
- %OPTION% The style has been added since the master styles were created.

[Ref.](https://helpx.adobe.com/indesign/using/paragraph-character-styles.html)

#### Q4. You want to ensure that an image on your page is exactly 25% of its original size. How can you determine whether the image is set to the desired size?

- %OPTION% Double-click the image with the Selection tool.
- %OPTION% Select the graphic frame with the Selection tool.
- %OPTION% Click **Window** > **Info**.
- %OPTION% Click **Object** > **Fitting**.

#### Q5. You have an empty one-page InDesign document. You have used File > Place to select a Word document that contains many pages of text. What will help you place the full story quickly?

- %OPTION% Select **Show Import Options** in the **Place** dialog box.
- %OPTION% Right-click the page with the place cursor.
- %OPTION% Shift-click with the place cursor inside the margin guides.
- %OPTION% In the **Pages** panel, click the **New Pages** button with the place cursor.

#### Q6. You select a graphic frame that contains a Photoshop image and use the Scale field in the Control panel to enlarge it to 200%. What happens to the effective image resolution?

- %OPTION% The resolution doubles.
- %OPTION% Effective image resolution stays the same until you choose from the View > Display Performance menu.
- %OPTION% Effective image resolution is set in Photoshop, not in InDesign, so it stays the same.
- %OPTION% Correct The resolution is cut in half.

#### Q7. What is one reason you might want to use the Text Variables feature?

- %OPTION% to create captions underneath images that update automatically
- %OPTION% to include calculations inside a dynamic table
- %OPTION% to adjust text size automatically to fill the frame
- %OPTION% to create running headers that include chapter names

#### Q8. You want to place 4 of a multipage PDF into an InDesign document. What should you do?

- %OPTION% In the **Place** dialog box, select **Show Import Options**.
- %OPTION% Import the PDF with the **Media** panel instead of **File>Place**
- %OPTION% Open the PDF in Acrobat, select page 4, and drag it into InDesign.
- %OPTION% After placing the PDF, disable the unwanted pages in the Media panel.

#### Q9. Suppose that master page B is based on master page A, and you are currently editing master B. Which statement is true?

- %OPTION% Objects on master page A are not visible.
- %OPTION% Objects on master page A must always appear behind objects from master page B.
- %OPTION% Objects on master page A cannot be selected unless you override the objects.
- %OPTION% Objects on master page A cannot be selected or changed.

#### Q10. In the image shown, the text is on a path. You want to move the text farther to the right along the path. How can you accomplish this?

![Q10](images/q10.png)

- %OPTION% Drag the blue square D.
- %OPTION% Drag the side handle B
- %OPTION% Drag the slanted line A.
- %OPTION% Drag the center tick mark C.

#### Q11. When you select a rectangular frame on the page, InDesign displays a yellow square near the frame's upper-right corner. What does this allow you to do?

- %OPTION% Change the corners from square to rounded.
- %OPTION% Anchor the object into another frame.
- %OPTION% Change teh layer or z-order of the frame.
- %OPTION% Link the frame to another frame.

#### Q12. What action can the Pen tool perform on a selected object?

- %OPTION% The Pen tool cannot affect an object after it has been created.
- %OPTION% You can click a point to convert it to a curve.
- %OPTION% You can drag the Pen tool inside a frame to convert it to a compound shape.
- %OPTION% You can click a point to delete it.

#### Q13. What is one reason you might want to use the Span Columns feature?

- %OPTION% You have a bullet list of six items that you want to split into two columns in the middle of a text frame.
- %OPTION% You are changing the number of columns on a page and want to ensure the text flows properly.
- %OPTION% You want a line or top shaded borded to span across the top of a multicolumn frame.
- %OPTION% You have a heading that you want to span across two threaded text frames

#### Q14. Which statement about tables is true?

- %OPTION% Tables are always anchored in a story in a text frame.
- %OPTION% To edit text in a table, you should first click **Table>Convert Table to Text**
- %OPTION% Tables must contain more than one cell.
- %OPTION% Tables cannot be anchored in a story in a text frame

#### Q15. Which feature would you use to create the effect shown, where the grouped circles blend with each other but not the object behind them?

![Q15](images/Q15.png)

- %OPTION% Global Light
- %OPTION% the Screen blending mode
- %OPTION% Isolate Blending
- %OPTION% Knockout Group

#### Q16. In the image shown, what do the colored frame edges indicate?

![Q16](images/Q16.png)

- %OPTION% which layer each object is on
- %OPTION% which master page each object is on
- %OPTION% which object style is applied to the frame
- %OPTION% that the red frame is locked

#### Q17. To resize any frame and its contents and maintain the proportions of both, which key or keys must you press while dragging from a corner handle?

- %OPTION% Ctrl (Windows) or Command (Mac)
- %OPTION% Alt+Shift (Windows) or Option+Shift (Mac)
- %OPTION% Ctrl+Shift (Windows) or Command+Shift (Mac)
- %OPTION% Alt+Spacebar (Windows) or Options+Spacebar (Mac)

#### Q18. In the image shown, what can you infer about how this document will print?

![Q18](images/Q18.png)

- %OPTION% The page wil be scaled to fit the paper.
- %OPTION% All document layers will be visible
- %OPTION% Some of the InDesign page will be cropped off.
- %OPTION% The master page P is applied to the document pages.

#### Q19. After you click a color in the **Gradient** panel to select it, how can you set its color to a swatch in the **Swatches** panel?

- %OPTION% Double-click the swatch.
- %OPTION% Option-click (Mac) or Alt-click (Windows) the swatch.
- %OPTION% You cannot apply a color swatch to a color stop in the **Gradient** panel.
- %OPTION% Drag the color stop over the color in the **Swatches** panel.

en.TITLE: Skill Assessments Quizzes
en.DESC:
Collection of questions and answers on different subjects aimed to help
you test your knowledge before an important job interview!

Data from __data__. UI by __bandinopla__

es.TITLE: Questionarios de evaluación de habilidades
es.DESC:
Colección de preguntas y respuestas sobre diferentes temas orientadas a
ayudarte a testear tu conocimiento antes de una importante entrevista de trabajo! 

Datos de __data__. UI por __bandinopla__
